Package simplenlg.orthography.english

The orthography package currently contains only a single class, the Orthography Processor for English.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OrthographyProcessor
    This processing module deals with punctuation when applied to DocumentElements.

Package simplenlg.orthography.english Description

The orthography package currently contains only a single class, the Orthography Processor for English. The orthography processors deal with punctuation in text.
